title: 2015 Mercedes 2500 Sprinter Van
item_description:

Note: Certificate of Duplicate Title, and Transfer Form, will be mailed within 1 week after removal. The seller got vehicle smogged on 11/29/24, the electronic smog cert is valid with DMV until 02/27/25. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of registration, transfer, taxes, and fees due to the DMV.
